items.title: Utility companies are crying foul because tech giants like Amazon want to bypass the grid by plugging their data centers directly into power plants
items.description: Federal officials say fast development of data centers is vital to the economy and national security, including to keep pace with China in the AI race...

items.title: Starbucks’s CEO Brian Niccol earned a $5 million bonus after one month on the job—and will collect another $5 million in March
items.description: Brian Niccol stands to earn $10 million in signing bonuses after a "dogged pursuit" to convince him to lead the company.

items.title: As Europe closes door to ‘golden’ visa programs, Grenada launches invite-only program to offer citizenship to wealthy investors
items.description: "This model is a valuable way for countries to attract the investment and expertise they require."

items.title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is threatening Nvidia’s AI dominance
items.description: A new AI model from Chinese company DeepSeek is undermining the AI boom's darling, Nvidia.

items.title: Coca-Cola notches a Costco-sized win against Pepsi
items.description: It’s the first soda swap since 2013.
